content: Oh, how are we doing now?

parts.text: Oh, how are we doing now?

content:
I’m doing very well, thanks for asking! How about you—how are you doing today?

To get us started, why don’t you tell me a bit about your day so far? For example:  
- What did you do this morning?  
- Have you worked or studied today?  
- Anything out of the ordinary happen?

And I’d love to hear about your interests or hobbies. What do you enjoy doing in your free time? Feel free to write a few sentences—don’t worry about mistakes, we’ll work on them together.

(Aside: the word “hobby” means an activity you do for pleasure when you’re not working. You might also hear “interest” or “passion” to describe things you love doing.)
